skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

effects.description:

	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.
The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: King Belegar's cause is one all the Dawi can get behind - the Karaz Ankor *will* rise again.
The undertaking of Belegar swells the hearts of most Dwarfs, inspiring some to take up axe and hammer.
Powerful oaths have been spoken by Belegar; he will not give up, for the rage within is strong.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 when in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +4 when in foreign territory
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Lightweight, compact or simply equipped with the right tools for the job, Belegar's forces are particularly experienced in underground warfare.

skillTree.localised_description: Belegar's vengeful Ancestors impart an ember of their ancient rage within his forces, driving them to feats of incredible stalwartness.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: "I came here hoping to take it all back. I came hoping to look upon the far deeps, on the ancestor statues of the Abyss of Iron’s Dream..."

effects.description:
Construction cost: -50% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(all regions factionwide)

Passive ability: "Rune of Eight Peaks"
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: These armour plates have been girded with runes to ensure the wearer is protected from all manner of attacks.
Dawi of distinction tend to have the best weapons, whether made specially for them or taken as spoils from their defeated foes.
This Lord's ability to withstand prolonged combat and show fortitude has a positive effect on those fighting nearby.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +7% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.localised_description: A Lord and his az are never separated, for it is as much part of him as his beard.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.localised_description: A wise Lord will gather Engineers to his service, ensuring the Dwarfs maintain their technological edge.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
This unit takes no penalties when flanked.

This unit has variable  Missile Block Chance depending on which side of the unit is hit by a projectile.
	
	The missile block chance of each direction is:
	 100% from the front
	 50% from the sides
	 10% from the rear
This unit does not suffer a leadership penalty when the Lord dies. It can also rally after routing more often.

factionEffects.localised_description: Before the loss of the Eight Peaks, Belegar’s Ancestors were the kings of the nigh-impregnable fortress for many generations. The Angrund Clan is steeped in centuries of military understanding and has a keen eye for the particulars of siege warfare.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: +100% until Karak Eight Peaks is recaptured
Four ghostly but powerful Angrund Ancestor Heroes with unique skill trees
Unique building chain available at Karak Eight Peaks
Leadership: +10 when laying siege or encircling
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment during Underway battles
